item.title: APSB24-20: Security update available for Adobe ColdFusion
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe ColdFusion. These updates resolve critical vulnerabilities including remote code execution and information disclosure.
Products: Adobe ColdFusion 2023, Adobe ColdFusion 2021 Severity: Critical
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb24-20.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
